summary: Fix for the ancient and worn variants of the shrouded cowl.
descriptionHtml: This is just a simple fix for the ancient and worn shrouded cowls, there were two entries missing from these items in vanilla Skyrim that caused them not to show up when worn by beast races, this is fully compatible with all mesh and texture replacers, though it will conflict with any mods that alter the stats of these items, such as changing or removing the enchantments.
author: Dee Twenty
